grudges.reason: WAS 9 VP ahead - Market dominance ENDED today
grudges.debt: PAID IN FULL - seized entire Market district

grudges.reason: Completed Imperial Mandate for 12 VP and REMOVED my influence with the bonus
grudges.debt: VENGEANCE DELIVERED - Throne Room DESTROYED, Docks SEIZED, Palace INVADED

journal_entries.entry: CYCLE 3 BEGINS. The board is wiped clean - a fresh battlefield awaits. P2 sits 14 points ahead at 53 VP. UNACCEPTABLE. I watched them bloat on Market gold for two cycles while I fought on other fronts. No more. Today I struck FIRST. Four cubes slammed down on the Grand Exchange before anyone could blink. MKT_01 is MINE now - the 5 VP crown jewel of the Market district. Let P2 try to take it from me. I also planted my flag on Guild Master Aldric - blocking their easy Commerce courtier control. They want Trade Empire? They will have to FIGHT for every inch. Recruited Auctioneer Pryce to my cause - another Commercial blade for my arsenal. Turn 2 he brings gold. Turn 3 he places Market influence. The Commercial war machine is primed. P1 is still licking wounds at 39 VP - tied with me. They are secondary. P2 is the threat. P2 must BURN. I deploy all my resources immediately. No hesitation. No reserves. AGGRESSION WINS WARS.

TOTAL WAR. Ten cubes of influence flooded the board today - every last one deployed to CRUSH P2's economic dreams. The Grand Exchange now stands at 5 cubes - a FORTRESS. Let them try to take it. They will break themselves against those walls while I laugh. But I did not stop there. Four cubes SLAMMED into Merchant Guild - MKT_02 is now MINE. That is 8 VP in territory I control in Market alone. The look on P2's face when they see their precious economic heartland being ripped away will be DELICIOUS. And the masterstroke - I seized Guild Master Aldric with 3 cubes. P2 cannot complete Trade Empire now. I hold the key courtier. They control Trade Commissioner Vale but that is WORTHLESS without Aldric. Their petition path is BLOCKED. Recruited Elena Rosetti to the conspiracy - 7 gold fills my war chest, and she brings more Commercial firepower for the campaigns ahead. P1 grabbed Barracks again with BAR_01 - fine, let them have their military playground. The REAL battle is in the Market, and I am WINNING. Pool empty. Gold at 8 after Elena's contribution. No regrets. DOMINATION THROUGH AGGRESSION.

THE MARKET IS MINE. EVERY. SINGLE. SQUARE. Twenty-two cubes of influence crashed across the board today like a tidal wave of CONQUEST. Silk Bazaar - TAKEN. Spice Stalls - TAKEN. Fishmonger Row - TAKEN. P2's last three Market holdouts ripped from their grasp. ALL EIGHT SQUARES NOW FLY MY BANNER. Sixteen VP in territorial control from Market ALONE. But I did not stop there. The Temple calls to me now - my Religious agents Father Dominic and Monsignor Pietro channeled their divine authority into the district. High Altar claimed with 4 cubes. Inner Sanctum secured via Dominic's holy ability. Chapel occupied. That is 9 more VP in Temple territory. And the masterstroke - Guild Master Aldric is NOW MINE. I broke the tie with P2, four cubes to their two. Trade Empire is DEAD. They cannot complete it. Their petition path is ASHES. Even Knight Commander Steele joined the assault, his military precision placing 2 cubes in Barracks Training Yard to contest P1's fortress. Let them sweat. Recruited Elena Rosetti to position 5 - she brings 7 gold and next turn her Commercial influence swells my ranks further. Marcus Venditti's ability flooded my treasury with 5 more gold. The war chest overflows. P2 led by 7 VP at turn start. After this turn? THEY ARE BROKEN. Their economic empire lies in ruins. The Market that was their lifeblood now pumps gold into MY veins. P1 holds Barracks but for how long? I contest their Training Yard. Next turn, more of my conspiracy awakens. More abilities unlock. More DESTRUCTION awaits. This is not a game anymore. This is ANNIHILATION. VICTORY THROUGH ABSOLUTE DOMINATION.

TWIN DISTRICT SUPREMACY ACHIEVED. Turn 5 abilities UNLEASHED devastation across the board. Monsignor Pietro channeled divine wrath - FOUR FREE CUBES crashed into Temple. Cloister TAKEN. Graveyard TAKEN. Ossuary TAKEN. SIX OF SIX Temple squares now fly my banner. COMPLETE RELIGIOUS DOMINATION. The High Priest Matthias courtier was already mine - now Temple itself bends to my will. And Marcus Venditti? That magnificent merchant warrior placed THREE cubes in Market AND filled my coffers with 3 more gold. MKT_03 Banking House - P2 thought they could hold it with 3 measly cubes. WRONG. Four cubes from Venditti plus my pool SEIZED IT. And I took MKT_05 Spice Stalls too - another 2 cubes and P2's last Market foothold CRUMBLES. EIGHT OF EIGHT Market squares. FULL CONTROL. Sister Evangeline courtier locked down - 2 cubes, full slots, MINE. Now I hold High Priest Matthias AND Sister Evangeline - the Religious coterie trembles before me. Recruited Siege Master Kragg - Military agent with Turn 2 removal ability. Next cycle his destruction capabilities come online. P1 leads at 69 VP. P2 at 65. I sit at 60. But the VP will flow NOW. Market control grants 16 VP worth of territory. Temple grants 10 VP. I AM the territorial hegemon. Let them fight over scraps in Barracks and Docks. The economic and spiritual heart of this city BEATS for ME. Gold at 18 and rising. Influence pool still has 12 cubes for next turn's assault. No escalation needed - just continued DOMINATION. THE THRONE IS WITHIN REACH.

EMERGENCY WAR FOOTING. P1 had the AUDACITY to complete Imperial Mandate - TWELVE VP in a single petition! They sit at 90 VP now, TWENTY-NINE points ahead of me. This is UNACCEPTABLE. They thought they could coast to victory while I consolidated my religious and commercial holdings? WRONG. Today I answered their arrogance with STEEL AND FIRE. Knight Commander Steele's Turn 6 ability FINALLY came online - THREE CUBES OF P1'S INFLUENCE RIPPED from the Harbormaster Office! DOC_01 was their Docks anchor with 5 cubes. Now it bleeds. And I did not stop there. Siege Master Kragg's removal ability CLEARED their Training Yard completely - BAR_03 now stands EMPTY, ready for MY occupation. TWENTY-TWO cubes of influence FLOODED the battlefield. DOC_01 receives EIGHT cubes - P1's remaining 2 will be DROWNED. DOC_02 TAKEN with 4 cubes against their 2. DOC_06 TAKEN with 3 cubes against their 1. The Docks that P1 thought were their stronghold? I am SEIZING THEM. Barracks too - BAR_03 and BAR_05 now fly my colors. And the masterstroke? COURT_001 Guild Master Aldric is now MINE outright - 4 cubes to P2's 2. The Council of Lords petition draws closer. Marcus Venditti adds 3 gold AND 3 cubes to MKT_04, stealing P2's last Market holdout while fattening my treasury to 21 gold. The gap is 29 VP. By the end of this turn it will be MUCH smaller. P1 thought they won this game with Imperial Mandate. They thought WRONG. I control Market. I control Temple. And now I am COMING for their Docks and Barracks. Let them try to stop me. Let them TRY. THIS IS TOTAL WAR.

THE FINAL RECKONING. Cycle 3 Turn 7 - the last turn before the board resets. P1 sits at 83 VP. P2 at 73 VP. I trail at 60. The gap is vast but TODAY I CLOSE IT. Knight Commander Steele unleashes his ultimate devastation - THREE CUBES RIPPED from P1's Throne Room! The crown jewel of their Palace empire, PAL_01 with its 5 VP, now stands EMPTY. Their Palace dominance is SHATTERED. Siege Master Kragg storms the Barracks - THREE cubes slam into the empty Mess Hall. BAR_05 is MINE. Baron von Stahl plants my banner in Gardens - Thieves' Guild (GAR_01, 4 VP) falls with a single cube. A NEW FRONT OPENS. But the true masterpiece is the TOTAL DOCKS ANNIHILATION. Twenty-three cubes of influence cascade across the harbor district like a tsunami. DOC_05 Dry Dock - P1 had 4 cubes there. I placed FIVE. MINE NOW. DOC_07 Fish Market - P1 had 1 cube. TWO cubes from my pool DROWNS them. DOC_08 Smuggler's Cove - same story. DOC_03 Shipwright - P2 thought their single cube was safe. WRONG. Two cubes and I OWN IT. The entire Docks district now flies MY colors. Eight of eight squares. COMPLETE MARITIME DOMINATION. I also stormed the Palace itself - PAL_08 Servant Quarters and PAL_09 Dungeon Access both claimed with 3 cubes each. P1's Palace fortress has been BREACHED. The Barracks expansion continues - BAR_06 and BAR_07 both seized with 2 cubes each. And the Noble courtier Duchess Seraphina? I placed 2 cubes there to CONTEST P1's grip. They thought their courtier network was secure. THEY THOUGHT WRONG. Admiral Stormwind joins my conspiracy - Maritime faction reinforcement for the naval supremacy I now command. Recruited to position 8. The cycle ends with me controlling Temple (6 squares), Docks (8 squares), and significant holdings in Barracks, Palace, and Gardens. The VP gap remains but my TERRITORIAL dominance is UNDENIABLE. When the cycle resets, I will have proven one truth above all others: AGGRESSION. WINS. WARS.

CYCLE 4. A NEW WAR BEGINS. The board is wiped clean but the scars of defeat burn deep. P2 leads at 87 VP. P1 at 82 VP (jumped 5 VP already this turn - they moved FIRST). I languish at 51 VP - THIRTY-SIX POINTS behind the leader. UNACCEPTABLE. But worse than the VP gap? The PROMOTION gap. P1 has TWO promoted courtiers (Captain Thorne, Duke Valorian). P2 has ONE (Admiral Stormwind). I have ZERO. They built PERMANENT infrastructure while I wasted VP on temporary territorial gains. This changes NOW. My one bright spot: I control BOTH Religious courtiers (High Priest Matthias, Sister Evangeline) with monopoly positions. And Monsignor Pietro sits at Level 4 - PROMOTION READY. At cycle end, Pietro WILL become a promoted courtier. That is my mission. But first, the immediate battle. Turn 1 limits me to Commercial faction only - Marcus Venditti is my sole active agent. His abilities do not unlock until Turn 3. So I struck with what I had. Four cubes on MKT_01 Grand Exchange - the 5 VP crown jewel. But P2 had ALREADY placed there! The market place mechanic triggered - my cubes CANCELLED their cubes. The square stands empty now, neither controlled. I denied them 5 VP even if I did not claim it myself. A pyrrhic strike but DENIAL IS AGGRESSION. No abilities available. No recruitment worth making. The conspiracy is full with worthy agents. Next turn Steele awakens (Military). Turn 3 brings Venditti's gold generation AND Pietro's courtier influence ability. The machine is spinning up. For now I conserve power cards - Universal Connections and Tactical Advantage are too valuable to waste. When I can complete PETITION_015 Council of Lords (11 VP!), those cards will be my weapons. But that requires taking COURT_001 from P2's tied position. The math is cruel but clear: I need 36 VP to catch P2. PETITION_015 alone is 11 VP. Territory gains, removal abilities, and most critically - PROMOTIONS at cycle end. Pietro will be my first permanent asset. The war for courtiers begins NOW.

THE HOLY CONQUEST. Turn 5 - the abilities AWAKEN and DEVASTATION follows. Three agents unleash their powers in a coordinated ASSAULT. Monsignor Pietro - that magnificent Vatican envoy - channels divine fury through his Turn 5 ability. FOUR FREE CUBES crash into the High Altar! P1 thought they could hold TMP_01 with a mere 2 influence. WRONG. My 4 cubes DROWNS their pitiful defense. The High Altar - crown jewel of the Temple at 5 VP - NOW FLIES MY BANNER. Father Dominic follows his master's example - THREE FREE CUBES into Inner Sanctum. TMP_02 (4 VP) is MINE. Marcus Venditti proves commerce serves aggression - THREE cubes to Grand Exchange plus 3 gold to my war chest. The Market offensive BEGINS. But the territorial sweep is just the opening act. TWENTY-ONE CUBES from my pool FLOOD the board. Chapel. Cloister. Graveyard. Ossuary. ALL SIX Temple squares now bear my mark. COMPLETE TEMPLE DOMINATION! And the masterstroke - THREE cubes SLAM into Duchess Seraphina. P1 held her with 3 influence. Now I have FIVE. The Noble courtier is MINE. COURT_003 + COURT_004 + COURT_007 - the Religious coterie AND the Noble heart bow to me. And then... UNIVERSAL CONNECTIONS. That beautiful power card transforms tied control of Guild Master Aldric into virtual ownership. PETITION_015 COUNCIL OF LORDS - COMPLETED! ELEVEN VP flows into my coffers like a river of VICTORY. Plus 4 gold from the bonus. I went from 50 VP to 61 VP in a SINGLE TURN. The gap to P1 shrinks from 47 to 36 points. Three squares in Market claimed. Barracks contested at BAR_05. Admiral Stormwind recruited for Maritime expansion next cycle. Pietro sits at Level 4 - PROMOTION READY. At cycle end, he will claim a courtier position PERMANENTLY. P1 thought their early lead was insurmountable. P2 thought their economic engine would carry them. They BOTH thought wrong. The Temple is my FORTRESS. The petition is my TRIUMPH. And the war? The war is FAR from over. AGGRESSION. WINS. EVERYTHING.

TOTAL DEVASTATION UNLEASHED. P1 sits at 105 VP - FIFTY-FOUR points ahead! UNACCEPTABLE! Today I answered with the LARGEST OFFENSIVE of the entire war. SIX AGENT ABILITIES fired in coordinated ASSAULT. Knight Commander Steele - Turn 6 unlocked his ULTIMATE POWER - THREE CUBES RIPPED from P1's Commander's Tower! BAR_01, their Barracks anchor at 5 influence, now BLEEDS at just 2. But I did not stop there. Siege Master Kragg follows with ANOTHER removal - BAR_01 drops to JUST ONE CUBE. And then? FOUR CUBES from my pool SEIZE IT. The Commander's Tower - crown jewel of Barracks at 5 VP - NOW FLIES MY BANNER! P1's 'impregnable fortress' has been BREACHED. The Temple offensive was equally devastating. Monsignor Pietro channeled divine wrath - FOUR cubes to High Altar. Father Dominic added THREE cubes to Inner Sanctum. Marcus Venditti flooded MKT_01 with three cubes AND filled my empty treasury with 3 gold. Elena Rosetti secured MKT_02. TWENTY-FIVE CUBES from my pool CRASHED across THREE districts. Market: Seven squares SEIZED (MKT_01 through MKT_07). That is 16 VP of territory from a district that was EMPTY this morning! Temple: ALL SIX squares now bear my mark. Chapel. Cloister. Graveyard. Ossuary. Plus the High Altar and Inner Sanctum from abilities. COMPLETE TEMPLE DOMINATION - 10 VP! Barracks: Commander's Tower STOLEN from P1, Barricades claimed. TWO squares seized from their 'fortress'. And Duchess Seraphina? TWO more cubes contest P1's Noble grip. They thought their courtier network was secure. They thought WRONG. The gap was 54 VP. After this territorial TSUNAMI? The board tells a different story. I control FIFTEEN squares across three districts. P1's Barracks monopoly is SHATTERED. Their 5-square district control bonus? GONE. That removal ability combination - Steele's 3 plus Kragg's 1 - that was PURE DESTRUCTION. Four influence RIPPED from their strongest position, then I TOOK it with overwhelming force. This is not a comeback. This is ANNIHILATION. P1 and P2 built their empires on sand. Today, the tide came in. AGGRESSION. ALWAYS. WINS.

THE FINAL RECKONING OF CYCLE 4. P1 sits at 120 VP - SIXTY-NINE POINTS ahead! The gap is insurmountable in raw VP terms. But the BOARD tells a different story. Twenty-nine cubes of influence FLOODED across SIX DISTRICTS in a tidal wave of TERRITORIAL CONQUEST. The Market district - EMPTY when dawn broke - now flies my banner across EIGHT squares. MKT_01 Grand Exchange receives FIVE cubes. MKT_02, MKT_03, MKT_04 - each claimed with overwhelming force. Venditti's ability adds THREE more. COMPLETE COMMERCIAL DOMINATION! The Docks offensive was equally devastating. P1 thought their 4-cube hold on DOC_01 Harbormaster Office was secure. WRONG. FIVE CUBES from my pool DROWNS them. DOC_02, DOC_03 fall with single strikes. Rosetti's ability adds TWO MORE to the naval assault. And the crown jewel - Knight Commander Steele UNLEASHES his Turn 6 devastation. THREE CUBES RIPPED from P1's Commander's Tower in Barracks! Their 5-cube fortress reduced to 2. And then? THREE of my cubes SEIZE IT. The 5 VP heart of their military stronghold NOW BEATS FOR ME. Gardens opens as a new front - GAR_01 Thieves' Guild (4 VP) claimed with 4 cubes. GAR_02 falls. The Criminal underworld bows to my banner. Temple contested - TMP_03, TMP_05, TMP_06 all receive cubes to deny P1 full district control. Palace breached - PAL_05 claimed. Guild Master Aldric courtier SECURED with 2 cubes breaking the tie (4 vs P1's 2). The Commerce coterie is MINE. And the true victory? Monsignor Pietro - Level 4 - stands ready for PROMOTION at cycle transition. When the influence resets, HE will claim High Priest Matthias PERMANENTLY. My first promoted courtier. The gap in permanent infrastructure FINALLY closes. P1 has 2 promotions. P2 has 1. Soon I have 1. The war for the throne continues. Cycle 5 awaits. And I will be READY. AGGRESSION. FORGES. EMPIRES.

THE FINAL CYCLE BEGINS. THE LAST WAR. P2 leads at 108 VP. P1 trails at 106 VP. I sit at 89 VP - NINETEEN POINTS behind the throne. But this is not a game of defense. This is a game of CONQUEST. The board reset, wiped clean of all influence. A fresh battlefield. Perfect for the warlord who strikes FIRST. And strike I did. Marcus Venditti opened the treasury - his Turn 3 ability floods my war chest with 5 gold. TEN GOLD now sits in my coffers (1 start + 4 agent gold + 5 ability). Resources for DESTRUCTION. Then came the hammer blow. P2 - that economic PARASITE - thought they could plant their flag on the Grand Exchange. They placed 1 measly cube through their precious Guildmaster Harrow. PATHETIC. I answered with INSPIRE. Two cubes of purchased influence SLAMMED into MKT_01. Their influence CANCELLED. That 4 VP crown jewel? MINE NOW. The Aggressive Warlord does not wait. The Aggressive Warlord TAKES. But I did not stop at one square. Venditti's auto-canvassing placed 2 more cubes on MKT_02 - the Merchant Guild. SEVEN VP from Market territory already in my grasp while my rivals scramble with their Turn 1 limitations! P1 grabbed Commander's Tower in Barracks with Varro's ability. Let them FORTIFY. Let them BUILD their walls. Knight Commander Steele awakens Turn 2 with his devastating removal ability - THREE CUBES RIPPED from any position. That fortress WILL BURN. They build. I DESTROY. That is the way of the warlord. The math is brutal: 19 VP gap with 7 turns remaining. 2.7 VP per turn needed to catch P2. But every square they claim, I will CONTEST. Every position they fortify, I will DEMOLISH. Steele and Kragg together can remove FOUR influence per turn. No defense can withstand that barrage. P2 thought the Market was their birthright. Today I reminded them - NOTHING is safe from my blade. The Grand Exchange belongs to ME. Turn 2 brings more agents online. More abilities. More DEVASTATION. The final cycle has begun. AND I WILL NOT BE DENIED. AGGRESSION. WINS. EVERYTHING.

CYCLE 5, TURN 2 - THE BARRACKS INVASION. Knight Commander Steele awakens alongside Venditti. NO ABILITIES AVAILABLE - Steele requires Turn 4, Venditti Turn 3. The limitations BURN. But the Aggressive Warlord does not wait for abilities. The Aggressive Warlord ACTS. My full 12-cube influence pool CRASHES across two fronts in a coordinated assault. First strike: MKT_03 Banking House. P2 thought they could fortress this with 4 cubes? WRONG. My 4 cubes met theirs head-on. The conflict mechanics triggered - cube for cube, MUTUAL ANNIHILATION. Neither controls it. But they WASTED their cubes. And while they lick their wounds, I opened a SECOND FRONT. FIVE CUBES slammed into BAR_02 - the Armory. P1's precious Barracks stronghold? NOW HAS AN ENEMY AT THE GATES. Their 3-cube Commander's Tower fortress at BAR_01 faces 5 cubes of Military might on the adjacent square. Let them sweat. Let them TREMBLE. P1's Captain Varro used his removal ability to ELIMINATE my last cube from MKT_01. The Grand Exchange stands empty - my 4 VP territory STOLEN by that surgical strike. A DEBT IS RECORDED. Varro will PAY. That removal ability makes him PRIORITY TARGET for future cycles. The courtier play FAILED. Guild Master Aldric (COURT_001) sits at 4/4 capacity - no room for my 3 cubes. The aggression was thwarted by LOGISTICS, not opposition. A frustrating waste of planning. Those 3 cubes remain in my pool, unspent. UNUSED potential that BURNS. NO recruitment - conspiracy full at 7 agents. The war machine is assembled. Now it must GRIND. The Quiet Day event reduces my exposure by 1 - scapegoat mechanics favor the most exposed. Fine. Less penalty at cycle end. More gold for WAR. Current position: MKT_01 LOST to Varro's strike. MKT_02 still flies my banner (2 cubes from Turn 1). MKT_03 CONTESTED to mutual destruction. BAR_02 CLAIMED with 5 cubes - a military foothold in enemy territory. The VP gap remains at 19 points. But the territorial expansion continues. Turn 3 brings Venditti's gold ability and Pietro's Religious influence. The war machine ACCELERATES. P1 thinks their Barracks is safe behind walls. P2 thinks their Market belongs to them. They are BOTH about to learn: THE AGGRESSIVE WARLORD TAKES WHAT HE WANTS. AGGRESSION. NEVER. RESTS.

THE ABILITIES AWAKEN. TURN 3 DEVASTATION. For two turns I waited - watching P1 fortify Barracks, watching P2 claim Market scraps. Today the chains BROKE. TWO ABILITIES fired in coordinated ASSAULT. Marcus Venditti channels commercial might - FIVE GOLD floods my war chest. The treasury swells to SEVEN GOLD. Resources for future Inspire actions. Resources for DESTRUCTION. But the gold is secondary. Monsignor Pietro - that magnificent Vatican envoy - channels divine authority through his Turn 3 ability. TWO CUBES crash onto High Priest Matthias! COURT_003 now stands at FOUR cubes for me versus P1's pathetic ONE. The Religious courtier is LOCKED. SEALED. MINE FOREVER. Let them try to contest it. Let them WASTE resources trying. Then came the TERRITORIAL TSUNAMI. All EIGHTEEN cubes of my influence pool DEPLOYED across FOUR FRONTS. Grand Exchange - P1 thought they could leave it empty after Varro's removal last turn. FIVE CUBES claim it. MKT_01 (4 VP) is MINE. Banking House - P2's Market pretensions continue to crumble. FOUR CUBES seize MKT_03 (3 VP). Commander's Tower - P1's precious Barracks anchor at BAR_01. They had THREE cubes. I sent FOUR. The conflict mechanics do their work - their 3 cancel my 3, I have ONE remaining. THE TOWER IS SEIZED. Their 4 VP fortress NOW FLIES MY BANNER. High Altar - Pietro's divine blessing extends to Temple itself. FIVE CUBES claim TMP_01 (4 VP). The holy conquest BEGINS. Total territorial gain this turn: FIFTEEN VP worth of squares. MKT_01, MKT_03, BAR_01, TMP_01 - all under my control. P1's Barracks dominance? SHATTERED. P2's Market hopes? DROWNING. The VP gap to P2 was 20 points. After this turn? The board screams a different story. I control Market's crown jewels. I seized the Commander's Tower from P1's grasp. Temple bows before Pietro's holy mandate. General Korrath (COURT_005) remains MINE at 4/4 slots. High Priest Matthias (COURT_003) is now LOCKED at 4 vs 1. The courtier network expands. Turn 4 brings Steele's PLACEMENT ability - two free cubes in Barracks. The fortress grows stronger. Turn 5 brings Pietro's Temple placement - four free cubes. Turn 6 brings STEELE'S ULTIMATE - three cubes REMOVED from anywhere. The destruction capabilities MULTIPLY each turn. P1 has their promotions. P2 has their gold. I have EIGHTEEN SQUARES OF TERRITORY and the most powerful ability lineup in the game. AGGRESSION. CONQUERS. ALL.

THE GRAND OFFENSIVE. THE TURN THAT CHANGED EVERYTHING. For four turns I clawed, scraped, and FOUGHT from 19 points behind. Today? THE GAP IS ONE. ONE MEASLY POINT. COUNCIL OF LORDS - COMPLETED. That magnificent power card Universal Connections proved its worth a hundredfold. It substituted for Guild Master Aldric - that tied courtier no one controlled - and unlocked PETITION_015. ELEVEN VICTORY POINTS crashed into my treasury like a battering ram through castle gates. 112 VP became 123 VP in a SINGLE FREE ACTION. Plus 4 gold from the bonus. The war chest OVERFLOWS at 20 gold. But the petition was merely the opening salvo. Marcus Venditti channeled his Turn 5 commercial mastery - THREE cubes seized Banking House from P2's pathetic 1-cube defense, PLUS 3 gold. The Market COMPLETE - all EIGHT squares fly my banner. Knight Commander Steele stormed Training Yard in Barracks - 2 cubes vs P1's 1 = TAKEN. Barracks COMPLETE - all SEVEN squares under military control. THREE COMPLETE DISTRICTS. Market. Temple. Barracks. Thirty-seven VP in territorial holdings from districts alone. Then came the PALACE INVASION. TWELVE cubes from my pool CRASHED through P1's fortress walls. Throne Room - their 4 VP crown jewel defended by 2 cubes - FELL to my 3. Royal Chamber - 3 cubes of defense SHATTERED by my 4. Council Room. Royal Garden. Courtyard. Guard Post. Servant Quarters. SEVEN of nine Palace squares NOW FLY MY BANNER. P1's Palace 'empire' reduced to a single square - Grand Hall with 3 cubes. Pathetic. And the DOCKS. Nine cubes flooded the harbor. Customs House TAKEN from P1 (3 vs 2). Shipwright TAKEN (2 vs 1). Dry Dock, Sailor's Tavern, Fish Market, Smuggler's Cove - all CLAIMED. P1's Docks dominance SHATTERED. They cling to Harbormaster Office with 4 cubes and NOTHING ELSE. THIRTY-FOUR SQUARES CONTROLLED. Five districts bearing my influence. Three COMPLETE. The board is MINE. P1 sits at 124 VP with TWO measly squares left (PAL_03, DOC_01). P2 sits at 124 VP hiding behind Academy's walls. I sit at 123 VP with TERRITORIAL SUPREMACY across the entire city. Turn 6 brings STEELE'S ULTIMATE - three cubes REMOVED from any district. PAL_03 or DOC_01? One of P1's last holdouts DIES. The Barracks district power removes 3 more. The Market district power grants 3 gold or 2 free cubes. TRIPLE DISTRICT DEVASTATION AWAITS. And at cycle end? PROMOTIONS. Steele to General Korrath. Pietro to High Priest Matthias. TWO PERMANENT COURTIERS. The promotion gap CLOSES. The VP gap is ONE POINT. The territorial gap is THIRTY-FOUR to TWO. This is not a comeback story. This is the story of an AGGRESSIVE WARLORD who REFUSED to accept defeat. Who ATTACKED when others defended. Who SPENT when others hoarded. The throne is ONE POINT AWAY. AND I WILL NOT BE DENIED. AGGRESSION. WINS. EVERYTHING.
